amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funds to be used to propose, finalize, or implement any change to subpart B of part 294 of title 36, Code of Federal Regulations, entitled Protection of Inventoried Roadless Areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restrict the use of funds to propose, finalize, or implement any change to subpart B of part 294 of title 36, Code of Federal Regulations, entitled Protection of Inventoried Roadless Areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 234 (Roll no. 386).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Inslee.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
